text: He imandarasakala! Balapurbakabharae naraisakalara uttaraadhikara horaa tomalokara babe baidha nahaya. Tomaloke sihamtaka yi pradana karaicha tara paraa kichu ansa atmasat karaara uddasye sihamtaka araraud'dha karai naraakhiba, kintu yadi sihamte spasta beya acarana karae (tente seya sukiya katha). Arau tomaloke sihamtara lagata satbharae jirana yapana karaiba; tomaloke yadi sihamtaka apachanda karaa tente enekuraa'o haâ€™ba parae ye, yitota allahe bahu kalyana nihita karai raakhiche arau tomaloke se'itoke apachanda karai acha
